description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which represent a referral by either a service or person . This vocab contains distinct set of codes. Any leaf concept code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Referral by Person' or 'Referral by Service' concept with concept original id 307834000 or 307835004.
